title: So I have some Questions regarding the best way to post images on the forum (for my inc big thread)
body:
I have translated all images to a jpeg, uploaded them onto imgur because I am not very photo savvy and was looking for easiest possible route, however while testing what works and what doesn't, I find it crops the image too much and people would need to click every chart to see the full image... How can I fix this? It'd be useless if you had to click every single image to see it one at a time...

Also any other advice on good ways to make sure the post works out would be appreciated
